    • 方法详细资料

      • load

        public static JsonConfiguration load(File file)
                              throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: IOable
        Loads data from the specified location.

        All the values contained within this configuration will be removed, leaving only settings and defaults, and the new values will be loaded from the given file.

        If the file cannot be loaded for any reason, an exception will be thrown.
        指定者:
        load 在接口中 IOable
        参数:
        file - File to load from.
        抛出:
        IOException - Thrown when the given file cannot be load.

      • save

        public void save(File file)
          throws IOException,
                 IllegalArgumentException
        从接口复制的说明: IOable
        Saves this configuration file to the specified location.

        If the file does not exist, it will be created. If already exists, it will be overwritten. If it cannot be overwritten or created, an exception will be thrown.

        指定者:
        save 在接口中 IOable
        参数:
        file - File to save to.
        抛出:
        IOException - Thrown when the given file cannot be written to for any reason.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when file is null.

      • reload

        public void reload()
            throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: FileConfiguration
        Reload configuration from file.
        指定者:
        reload 在接口中 FileConfiguration
        抛出:
        IOException - Failed to load file.

      • save

        public void save()
          throws IOException
        指定者:
        save 在接口中 FileConfiguration
        抛出:
